overview: Wherever Italian porn legend Rocco Siffredi goes, outlandish fun and nasty, rough sex are sure to happen. When the smut superstar visits old friends in Porn Valley, he gets his pick of the hottest girls in U.S. adult entertainment. Rocco's Coming In America, a marathon, all-star extravaganza, features the Italian Stallion in intimate sessions with nine top American stars. Rocco fucks in every scene ... and revisits the sexy collaborations with Buttman that made them both famous!
title: Rocco's Coming In America
